content.query:
-- Create external table ExternalAggBluebike
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ExternalAggBluebike(
    date DATE, 
    riders INT,
    trips INT,
    stations INT,
    bikes_lost INT,
    bikes_not_returned INT,
    not_start_at_dock INT,
    avg_distance FLOAT,
    avg_duration FLOAT,
    avg_duration_min FLOAT,
    avg_duration_h FLOAT,
    avg_speed_ms FLOAT,
    avg_speed_kmh FLOAT,
    max_distance FLOAT,
    max_duration FLOAT,
    max_duration_min FLOAT,
    max_duration_h FLOAT,
    max_speed_ms FLOAT,
    max_speed_kmh FLOAT
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'gold/agg_bluebike/parquet/bluebike_agg.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = MyDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
);
GO

-- Create external table ExternalBluebike
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ExternalBluebike(
    ride_id NVARCHAR(100),
    rideable_type NVARCHAR(100),
    started_at DATETIME,
    ended_at DATETIME,
    start_station_name NVARCHAR(100),
    start_station_id NVARCHAR(100),
    end_station_name NVARCHAR(100),
    end_station_id NVARCHAR(100),
    start_lat FLOAT,
    start_lng FLOAT,
    end_lat FLOAT,
    end_lng FLOAT,
    member_casual NVARCHAR(100),
    is_bike_lost INT,
    is_return_to_dock INT,
    is_start_from_dock INT,
    distance FLOAT,
    duration FLOAT,
    speed_ms FLOAT,
    speed_kmh FLOAT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    is_not_return_to_dock INT,
    is_not_start_from_dock INT,
    duration_min FLOAT,
    duration_h FLOAT
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'gold/bluebike/parquet/bluebike.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = MyDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
);
GO

-- Create BlueBike table with matching data types (internal sql table)
CREATE TABLE BlueBike (
    ride_id NVARCHAR(100),
    rideable_type NVARCHAR(100),
    started_at DATETIME,
    ended_at DATETIME,
    start_station_name NVARCHAR(100),
    start_station_id NVARCHAR(100),
    end_station_name NVARCHAR(100),
    end_station_id NVARCHAR(100),
    start_lat FLOAT,
    start_lng FLOAT,
    end_lat FLOAT,
    end_lng FLOAT,
    member_casual NVARCHAR(100),
    is_bike_lost INT,
    is_return_to_dock INT,
    is_start_from_dock INT,
    distance FLOAT,
    duration FLOAT,
    speed_ms FLOAT,
    speed_kmh FLOAT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    is_not_return_to_dock INT,
    is_not_start_from_dock INT,
    duration_min FLOAT,
    duration_h FLOAT
);
GO

-- Insert data into BlueBike
INSERT INTO BlueBike (
    ride_id,
    rideable_type,
    started_at,
    ended_at,
    start_station_name,
    start_station_id,
    end_station_name,
    end_station_id,
    start_lat,
    start_lng,
    end_lat,
    end_lng,
    member_casual,
    is_bike_lost,
    is_return_to_dock,
    is_start_from_dock,
    distance,
    duration,
    speed_ms,
    speed_kmh,
    start_date,
    end_date,
    is_not_return_to_dock,
    is_not_start_from_dock,
    duration_min,
    duration_h
)
SELECT
    ride_id,
    rideable_type,
    started_at,
    ended_at,
    start_station_name,
    start_station_id,
    end_station_name,
    end_station_id,
    start_lat,
    start_lng,
    end_lat,
    end_lng,
    member_casual,
    is_bike_lost,
    is_return_to_dock,
    is_start_from_dock,
    distance,
    duration,
    speed_ms,
    speed_kmh,
    start_date,
    end_date,
    is_not_return_to_dock,
    is_not_start_from_dock,
    duration_min,
    duration_h
FROM 
    ExternalBluebike;
GO

-- Create AggBlueBike table with matching data types (internal sql table)
CREATE TABLE AggBlueBike (
    date DATE, 
    riders INT,
    trips INT,
    stations INT,
    bikes_lost INT,
    bikes_not_returned INT,
    not_start_at_dock INT,
    avg_distance FLOAT,
    avg_duration FLOAT,
    avg_duration_min FLOAT,
    avg_duration_h FLOAT,
    avg_speed_ms FLOAT,
    avg_speed_kmh FLOAT,
    max_distance FLOAT,
    max_duration FLOAT,
    max_duration_min FLOAT,
    max_duration_h FLOAT,
    max_speed_ms FLOAT,
    max_speed_kmh FLOAT
);
GO

-- Insert data into AggBlueBike
INSERT INTO AggBlueBike (
    date, 
    riders,
    trips,
    stations,
    bikes_lost,
    bikes_not_returned,
    not_start_at_dock,
    avg_distance,
    avg_duration,
    avg_duration_min,
    avg_duration_h,
    avg_speed_ms,
    avg_speed_kmh,
    max_distance,
    max_duration,
    max_duration_min,
    max_duration_h,
    max_speed_ms,
    max_speed_kmh
)
SELECT
    date, 
    riders,
    trips,
    stations,
    bikes_lost,
    bikes_not_returned,
    not_start_at_dock,
    avg_distance,
    avg_duration,
    avg_duration_min,
    avg_duration_h,
    avg_speed_ms,
    avg_speed_kmh,
    max_distance,
    max_duration,
    max_duration_min,
    max_duration_h,
    max_speed_ms,
    max_speed_kmh
FROM 
    ExternalAggBluebike;
GO

-- Create and load DimDate table
-- A dimension table focused on date attributes.
-- Provides date details like year, month, day, quarter,
-- and week, along with names for days and months, and a weekend indicator.

CREATE TABLE DimDate (
    date DATE,
    year INT,
    month INT,
    day INT,
    quarter INT,
    week INT,
    day_of_week INT,
    day_name VARCHAR(10),
    month_name VARCHAR(10),
    is_weekend BIT
);
GO

-- Populate DimDate Table from ExternalBluebike
INSERT INTO DimDate (
    date, year, month, day,
    quarter, week, day_of_week, 
    day_name, month_name, is_weekend
)
SELECT DISTINCT
    CAST(started_at AS DATE) AS date,
    DATEPART(YEAR, started_at) AS year,
    DATEPART(MONTH, started_at) AS month,
    DATEPART(DAY, started_at) AS day,
    DATEPART(QUARTER, started_at) AS quarter,
    DATEPART(WEEK, started_at) AS week,
    DATEPART(WEEKDAY, started_at) AS day_of_week,
    DATENAME(WEEKDAY, started_at) AS day_name,
    DATENAME(MONTH, started_at) AS month_name,
    CASE WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, started_at) IN (1, 7) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_weekend
FROM
    ExternalBluebike;
GO

-- Create and load DimDateTime table
-- A dimension table that breaks down date and time components.
-- Contains detailed temporal information such as year, month, day, hour, minute, 
--and whether the date is a weekend.

CREATE TABLE DimDateTime (
    date_time DATETIME,
    date DATE,
    year INT,
    month INT,
    day INT,
    hour INT,
    minute INT,
    second INT,
    quarter INT,
    week INT,
    day_of_week INT,
    day_name VARCHAR(10),
    month_name VARCHAR(10),
    is_weekend BIT
);
GO

INSERT INTO DimDateTime (date_time, date, year, month, day, 
hour, minute, second, quarter, week, 
day_of_week, day_name, month_name, is_weekend)
SELECT DISTINCT
    CAST(started_at AS DATETIME) AS date_time,
    CAST(started_at AS DATE) AS date,
    DATEPART(YEAR, started_at) AS year,
    DATEPART(MONTH, started_at) AS month,
    DATEPART(DAY, started_at) AS day,
    DATEPART(HOUR, started_at) AS hour,
    DATEPART(MINUTE, started_at) AS minute,
    DATEPART(SECOND, started_at) AS second,
    DATEPART(QUARTER, started_at) AS quarter,
    DATEPART(WEEK, started_at) AS week,
    DATEPART(WEEKDAY, started_at) AS day_of_week,
    DATENAME(WEEKDAY, started_at) AS day_name,
    DATENAME(MONTH, started_at) AS month_name,
    CASE WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, started_at) IN (1, 7) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_weekend
FROM
    ExternalBluebike;
GO
